text: (playful music)

♪ Helmet, helmet, it's
time to wear your helmet ♪

♪ No, no, no, I don't
want to wear my helmet ♪

♪ Please, please, a
helmet is good for you ♪
♪ No, no, no, I don't know it, eew. ♪
♪ See, see, teddy likes the helmet ♪
♪ One, two, three, almost on you see ♪

♪ No, no, no, it's
mine, I'll wear it now ♪
♪ Knock, knock, knock, I like it, wow ♪
(playful music)
♪ Knee pads, knee pad ♪
♪ It's time to wear your knee pads ♪

♪ No, no, no, I don't want
to wear my knee pads ♪

♪ Please, please, the knee
pads are good for you ♪
♪ No, no, no, I don't like them, eew ♪
♪ See, see, elephant likes the knee pads ♪
♪ One, two, three, almost on, you see ♪

♪ No, no, no, they're
mine, I'll wear them now ♪
♪ Strap, strap, strap, I like them, wow ♪
♪ Wrist guards, wrist guards ♪
♪ It's time to wear your wrist guards ♪

♪ No, no, no, I don't want
to wear my wrist guards ♪

♪ Please, please, wrist
guards are good for you ♪
♪ No, no, no, I don't like them, eew. ♪

♪ See, see, mousie
likes the wrist guards ♪
♪ One, two, three, almost on, you see ♪

♪ No, no, no, they're
mine, I'll wear them now ♪
♪ Clap, clap, clap, I like them, wow ♪

♪ Life vest, life vest, it's
time to wear your life vest ♪

♪ No, no, no, I don't want
to wear my life vest ♪

♪ Please, please, the life
vest is good for you ♪
♪ No, no, no, I don't like it, eew ♪
♪ See, see, monkey likes the life vest ♪
♪ One, two, three, almost on, you see ♪

♪ No, no, no, it's
mine, I'll wear it now ♪
♪ Buckle, buckle, buckle, I like it, wow ♪
♪ Seatbelt, seatbelt ♪
♪ It's time to wear your seatbelt. ♪

♪ No, no, no, I don't want
to wear the seatbelt ♪

♪ Please, please, the
seatbelt is good for you ♪
♪ No, no, no, I don't like it, eew ♪
♪ See, see, teddy wears the seatbelt ♪
♪ One, two, three, buckled up, you see ♪

♪ No, no, no, all right,
I'll wear it now ♪
♪ Click, click, click, I like it, wow ♪
